name: Cyber in Coffin
description:
You as a cyborg who seeking for data that may heal the illness.

But on your way to the facility. Something strang happening.

(This is my first Unreal Engine game....  Sorry for the big file size)

Controls

Mouse click on the ground to move.

Mouse click on object to interact.

BugFixs

Fix the issue of Face Puzzle can not be done if check poster too many time.(Uploaded)

Tips

You may use the coffin as....something weight
